message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $18000 for it. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $19500 to make it worth my while. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $19500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $18500 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting closer to meeting your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $19200. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but $19200 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $18500 for the product. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower.
